version_description:
Hi, everyone!
In our update we fixed some critical bug connected with adding to favorites.
Thank you, Loganrusso_3, that you reported on this.

Now you can add any address, without «https» and «www». 

For example «site.com» instead «https://www.site.com»

Also you can delete or edit any of your Bookmarks.  
Just lightly touch and hold the bookmark until it jiggles. And choose the action.

Thank you for support!
Team Split Screen

Hey everyone!
In this update we various bug fixes and UX improvements
Thank you for support

What's new?
We worked for a long time and we ready to introduce a new version of our application for you.

We have done a lot of thing:
1. Revised the design and approach to working with the application.
2. Prepared a bunch of cool content
3. We analyzed user behavior in the application and took into account all the errors of the first version.

Changed the functionality:
1. Made a selection of sites that are convenient to work in split screen mode
2. Made a completely new navigation on tabs and screens.
3. We tried to make functionality that would be convenient for everyone who uses the browser every day.

We hope you enjoy it.
We founded one critical bug connected with purchase verification and fixed it.

I am very happy to tell you about what new things were done in the new version of the application. I spent a lot of energy, I hope I succeeded.

So what was done:
1. Now you do not need to choose each time the applications that you would like to open from above or from below. The state of the application is saved.
2. I paid a lot of attention to fixing small bugs that could interfere with the application. The application has become more stable and more enjoyable to use.
3. And last but not least, I optimized the application in China. I changed the search system, added those applications that are relevant for this region.

In the near future I plan to add a dark theme. If someone needs this functionality, write about it in the comment. Thanks in advance.

I hope you enjoy the update.

In this version we fixed all known issues and improved the stability of the application. 
 Leave your feedback and help us improve our application!

What’s new in this version:
- Improved overall application performance.
- Made it so that on all devices the application now looks equally cool
- UX improvements
We are still waiting for feedback from you for further product improvements!
Thank you for using the app! We fixed bugs and made some improvements to enhance your experience with the application.

In this new version we have:
 • fixed commonly reported bugs
 • made general improvements to make your experience better

Thank you for using the app!
We fixed bugs and made some improvements to enhance your experience with the application.
Keep leaving your feedback, it's help me developing the app more useful for you with each update!

- Improved overall application performance.
- Fixed crashes
Please check it, Thank you for feedbacks;

What’s new in this version
- Fixed crashes
- Improved overall application performance.

Hey! Now you can use any favourites sites! Enjoy with it.
Also you can customise this block from the Bookmarks page
So,
- Unlocked Favourites sites on the main and search pages
- Fixed problem with colours in Dark mode

Keep leaving your feedback, it's help me developing the app more useful for you with each update!

What’s new in this version:
- removed recommended sites for China
- Improved interaction with top sites and favorites
- UX improvements

We've completely overhauled our split-screen approach.
We have removed all unnecessary and inconvenient.
We left and modified only what you like so much. Now, we hope you enjoy using the app even more!

This is only the first part of a large update, we will add something else in the near future) For now, you can leave your feedback and share your impressions!
Thank you for staying with us!
